page.title: 17 TALKING POINT
page.content: The main conversation now is whether or not to have a marina for small pri- vate yachts and fishing boats by extending the harbour.This extension could include a roll on roll off car and passenger ferry possibly to Wales France or Ireland.Not every body agrees,about half of the people are for the idea and the other half are against it.I like the idea.People are also thinking about having a chair lift or cable car from the top of Hillsborough down to the harbour or pier.The police are very concerned about the amount of B.M.X. bikes on the road.There used to be a track on Hillsborough but the council closed it down quite a long time ago, and now the police want to either build one somewhere where there is a lot of space or they would like to reopen the one at Hillsborough.
